message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its high value and quality, I am confident it will be worth every penny to you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire such a valuable asset at a price that is slightly above its intrinsic value but still offers significant savings compared to the market rate. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
